duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately perform all test procedures as listed in the procedure manual.
Perform and record all scheduled instrument preventative maintenance procedures.
Follow established quality control procedures, documenting corrective action if necessary.
Adhere to all turnaround times, document calls as necessary, verify critical values and specimen identification.
Verify completion of all stat results and all routine results in a timely manner.
Record workload and other statistics into computer system as necessary.
Perform assigned work safely adhering to established department safety rules and practices.
Perform other related duties as instructed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors of Science in Medical Technology or Medical Laboratory Science / ASCP Certification preferred
